ygData.subject: RE: NPCs selling lambent stones (was Lambent Stones on  E'ci)5
ygData.msgSnippet: he was lucky in that the npc he sold it to had lots of inexpensive items in his inventory.  even at level 50, imagine having to buy loads and loads of fine
ygData.messageBody:
he was lucky in that the npc he sold it to had lots of inexpensive items in
his inventory. even at level 50, imagine having to buy loads and loads of
fine steel that sell for 5pp but you have to buy back for 60pp. oh and he
was already that type of friend, and i was ecstatic that it worked and i was
able to help =)

Shada

>
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> Thats a great story Shada. Bet you made a friend for life
> with that tip.
>
> I would imagine that a lot of people have sold lambent stones
> to the gypsies
> in NK. Nice to know that if I'm having trouble finding a
> giant hunting
> party or someone selling a stone I can always try this
> option. Hard part
> then would be picking the right gypsy:-)
>
> Galtin of E'ci
